ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend the course.
Absolutely. If you want to be able to talk clearly about research design, this course is a must.
I would strongly recommend CP 1 to any student. This sequence is excellently run by an acknowledged leader in the field.
Survey of various methods used in CPWould recommend for any student planning to have CP as a subfield

An introduction to some of the fundamental concepts - including research questions and research design - in comparative politics. I would definitely recommend the course to another student: it provided superb preparation for intelligently consuming and producing research in the field of comparative politics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I think a few more of the texts we read could have been from the CP exam over the summer; most that we read were not.
Useful first CP - adds breadth to field knowledge while providing foundation to critique and plan research using different methods approaches
